mapper.select: select DONATION_PRICE from donation where to_char(DONATION_DATE, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
select count(APPLICATION_ID) from application where to_char(APPLICATION_DATE, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd')
select * from (select * from board where BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' and BOARD_TYPE != 'Not' order by BOARD_ID desc) where rownum <= 5
select * from ATTACHMENT join image using(attm_id) where FILE_STATUS ='Y' and ATTM_LEVEL = 0
select * from (select * from board where BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' and BOARD_TYPE = 'Not' order by BOARD_ID desc) where rownum <= 5
select count(*) from board where BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' and BOARD_TYPE = 'Not'
